tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ****** ********* ** *** **** ***** ******* ** ******** I was lucky enough to find Dr Saksham Mittal.. I had Jonts and pain repair surgery which was done very well and regarding recovery is amazing... I started walking in a week with support of walker and in 2 months I even climbed stairs and walked without any support... I am very thankful for the emotional and mental support frm the doctor and the staffs.. I highly recommend without any regret of choosing Dr saksham mittal
Very helpful and polite. Doctor was on time and very well able to understand my problem. Good environment and clean space.

Dr. Saksham is very calm and compost doctor. He listens to your query and then daignose you. Visiting him every time is a very satisfying experience. 
I went him for my pain in left leg joint pain, after diagnosing me he recommended me some exercises and medications. This helped me out in my recovery.
I recommend people suffering with any kind of orthopaedic problem should visit him.

Dr Saksham is a good experienced orthopaedic and treats his patients with patience and always makes sure that the patients are not panicking.
There is a physiotherapy facility and pathology lab at his clinic as well so overall you get treatment and test both at one place.
Really reliable dr.
Nice and gentle Doctor. Interaction with patient was good. He has a good knowledge of his profession
HE IS VERY HUMBLE AND GENTLE…….He resolve the problem quickly Tysm practo team and Dr Saksham …………..
**** ************* *** soft spoken doctor. Explain everything in no hurry . Treatedmy 9 year old son very well
I got a torn ligament grade 2 on my left ankle.. I am glad that I was under his supervision.. Explained the problem first then made sure I had no cracks, then explained the whole treatment
It was good, the doctor was quite friendly. Will be visiting again surely and would recommend to others as well

Good and to the point.
Consulted for a fall for my mother in law.
Good observation and proper direction
reply_text: Thanks. I am happy I was of help to you
